item.description:
2nd bus added tickets avalable MUST CALL NEAS TODAY 2/8 BY 1:00 - 401-738-0411

****BE AT MALL BY 5:10am Sunday absolutely latest- if later, you may miss the bus********

Cost is 74.95 which includes transportation and lift ticket pass - Deduct for X-country skiing - Details see web link/call NEAS

http://skitrip.net/daytrips.html

I recommend wearing orange vests when boarding the bus to make it easy in finding fellow members of the group

This meetup is posted to get a group together to have fun in the snow. You as an individual can choose to ski,snowboard, or x-country ski. So please understand that there is no offical organizer and who ever shows up may split into their own group accordingly by disipline and their abilities. It will be up to the attendees as to where they want to meet for lunch on the mountain if they choose to. This is quite different than other meetups and frankly tough to keep track of all who attend - So to be clear there will be no organizer to take attendance of who shows and who does not. You will be making your own decisions for the day and it is your responsibility to perform at you own abilities and hang with whoever you may choose provided you have a FUN and SAFE day.
item.name: Downhill and X-Country Snow Skiing, Boarding
